name: Visit the Visoki Dečani Monastery
description: Explore the Visoki Dečani Monastery, a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its well-preserved medieval frescoes.

name: Exploring Prizren's Old Town
description: Wander through the charming streets of Prizren's Old Town, rich in history and cultural heritage.

name: Hiking in the Rugova Valley
description: Discover the stunning landscapes of the Rugova Valley, offering excellent hiking and outdoor activities.

name: Bear Sanctuary Visit
description: Visit the Bear Sanctuary near Prishtina, providing a haven for rescued bears.

name: Tour of the Gračanica Monastery
description: Explore the Gračanica Monastery, a masterpiece of Serbian medieval architecture and a UNESCO World Heritage site.

name: Exploring the Gadime Caves
description: Visit the Gadime Caves, known for their unique stalactites and stalagmites formations.

name: National Library of Kosovo
description: See the unique architecture of the National Library of Kosovo in Prishtina, with its distinctive domes and cubes.

name: Visiting the Ethnological Museum (Muzeu Etnologjik)
description: Explore Kosovo's rich cultural heritage at the Ethnological Museum in Prishtina.

name: Mirusha Waterfalls
description: Enjoy the beauty of the Mirusha Waterfalls, a series of cascades in a scenic valley.

name: Brezovica Ski Resort
description: Experience skiing or snowboarding at Brezovica Ski Resort, one of the most popular winter sports destinations in Kosovo.
